Name: Tummy Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Munchlax and Snorlax.  Swap a Munch-Drool and a Munch-Claw for a Tummy Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
